fileName: [With you and the rain] Ame to Kimi to - S01E06 [1080p.AV1].mkv
title: With You and the Rain
overview: On a rainy day, Fuji meets a cute critter posing as a dog and offering an umbrella and a cue card that says, “Please take me home,” and she can’t resist. With this dog-poster’s quirky charm and mysterious ways, life together becomes a heartwarming adventure of friendship and shared seasons.

tv.episodeOverview: Fuji's twin brother, Teru, and his pregnant wife, Wako, leave their cat at Fuji's.
